title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content: cks while under the sun's glare. Several thralls are entrapped via magical runes. Cazador's HP and necrotic damage are buffed while he's feeding on them. Once you drafted Cazador, you need to decide whether or not to let Astarion complete the ritual. If the ritual is complete, Astarion will become a Vampire Ascendant, gaining the Ascendant Bite and Gaseous Form abilities, as well as bonus 1-10 necrotic damage for his attacks.
